mapper.insert: insert into materials_flow_tb(serial_no, material_no, material_name, desc, project_no, number, supplier, supplier_type, proxy, oper_type, last_modi_user, last_modi_time) values (#{serial_no}, #{material_no}, #{material_name}, #{desc}, #{project_no}, #{number}, #{supplier}, #{supplier_type}, #{proxy}, #{oper_type}, #{last_modi_user}, #{last_modi_time})
